member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator
member.summary: The generator asks the user if the adaptor or one of the prediction models of the PatternDescription shall be generated and then uses CodeSmith to generate it.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.IGenerator
member.summary: The provided interface of the Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation component.

members.member:
Starts the generation process for the given pattern. Generates artifact using CodeSmith.
The PatternDescription of the pattern for which artifacts are to be generated. The path of the CodeSmith configuration file.
TODO: Remove configurationPath and use standard path name?

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.pattern
member.summary: The pattern for which artifacts shall be generated.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.configurationPath
member.summary: The path of the CodeSmith configuration file for this.pattern.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.selectionDialog
member.summary: The GUI used for user selection of artifacts.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.patternDirectory
member.summary: The directory containing all information about this.pattern.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.currentArtifactName
member.summary: The name of the currently chosen artifact.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.currentTemplates
member.summary: The list of templates of the currently chosen artifact.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.generated
member.summary: Shows if artifacts have been generated.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.generationInProgress
member.summary: Indicates if external generation using CodeSmith is working at the moment.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.Start(Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription,System.String)
member.summary: Starts the generation process for the given pattern. The user is asked whether the adaptor or one of the prediction models shall be generated. After the generation the user can stop the generation process or generate another artifact.
member.param: The PatternDescription of the patttern for which artifacts are to be generated.
The path of the CodeSmith configuration file.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new generator and sets its initial attribute values.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.Generator_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method is called, when a generator button has been clicked. The method opens a new instance of CodeSmith for every template that is listed in the PatternDescription of the chosen pattern. If no pattern is chosen a MessageBox is opened.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.OpenTemplates
member.summary: This is a helper method for generator_Click which opens the given templates in CodeSmith.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.StartCodeSmith(System.String)
member.summary: Starts the CodeSmith configuration and generation GUI with the given template.
member.param: The name of a CodeSmith template file. As path the templates directory of the pattern is taken.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.Generator.Proc_Exited(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Is called when CodeSmith is exited. Calls OpenTemplates to restart CodeSmith with the next template or compile the generated sources and return to the selection.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog
member.summary: Creates a GUI to select an artifact for generation.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.components
member.summary: Erforderliche Designervariable.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.controller
member.summary: The controller which implements the event handling for this form.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.pattern
member.summary: The pattern for which this form shows chooseable artifacts

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.counter
member.summary: Counter used to get the right spaces in the GUI.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.tabCounter
member.summary: A counter counting the number of tabs to provide correct tabbing of the buttons.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.checkBoxes
member.summary: A list of check boxes. Each box belongs to a chooseable artifact.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.generatorButton
member.summary: Button to start the generation of the selected artifact.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Die verwendeten Ressourcen bereinigen.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Erforderliche Methode für die Designerunterstützung. Der Inhalt der Methode darf nicht mit dem Code-Editor geändert werden.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.InitialiseSelection
member.summary: Initialises the selection dialog.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.AddCheckBox(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a radio button with the given name and text at the current position.
member.param: The name of the new radio button.
The text of the new radio button.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.AddGeneratorButton
member.summary: Adds a button to start the generation of the chosen artifact.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.CheckBoxes
member.summary: A list of radio buttons where each button belongs to an artifact. The button belonging to the adaptor is name "adaptor". The other buttons have the same name as the prediction model they belong to.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Generation.SelectionDialog.GeneratorButton
member.summary: Button to start the generation of the selected artifact.
